name: Stok Kangri Trek
description: This trekking expedition of Stok Kangri has been designed to highlight the scenic beauty of the region as well as also explore the various monasteries, temples, natural vistas that it has to offer. This long and exciting expedition through the mountains, valleys and passes of Stok Kangri will expose you to the architectural beauty of their monasteries in addition to informing you about the rich culture the region is famous for. Also, experience nature at its best by trekking on mountains. The Leh palace will be the highlight of your trip as it has been in existence for the longest time.
